title: Cant start normal or bot game
body:
Hello, so recently i cant play normal or  bot games at all, it says theres an error: "attempt  to join queue failed" when i want to join the queue.
it may (or may not) be connected to not accepting too many games (not leaving, just not accepting the popup because i didnt hear the sound on the new client :c ).
May I get further information on this? I would like to know if its the case of punishment for not accepting too many games, and if it is, how long wil it stay like that?
Also, why  i  can play tutorial and custom, but not bots?

replies.body:
Hmm.. This sounds much like a common connection issue that occurs when you have an unstable connection to our servers, which can prevent you from reaching certain places in the client. I recommend checking our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) out, as it can resolve these types of issues in most cases.

Let me know if this helped!
solved: LeaverBuster doesnt work too well with new client ;)
unfortunately, i believe its not the case, because my boyfriend can start his games on his account but on the same computer just fine.
